SEARCH
程序包 sort.utils

接口 SortAlgorithm

所有已知实现类:
BubbleSort, HeapSort, InsertionSort, MergeSort, SelectionSort
public interface SortAlgorithm
This interface provides a common API for sorting algorithms to sort the input array. The implementation should provide a concrete implementation of the sort method that takes in the input array, the starting index, the ending index, and the axis of the array to sort. The axis value is used to control the sorting order, and 0 represents ascending order and 1 represents descending order.

The sort method should sort the given array in the given range, using the given axis value.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    static final int
    ASCENDING
    The axis value to represent ascending order.
    static final int
    DESCENDING
    The axis value to represent descending order.

    • checkRange

      default boolean checkRange(int arrayLength, int startIndex, int endIndex)
      This method checks if the given range is valid.
      参数:
      arrayLength - the length of the array
      startIndex - the starting index of the array
      endIndex - the ending index of the array, doesn't include
      返回:
      true if the given range is valid, false otherwise

      返回:

    • compare

      default int compare(Object o1, Object o2) throws IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, NoSuchMethodException, SecurityException
      Compares two objects using their compareTo method.

      This method retrieves the compareTo method from the first object's class and invokes it with the second object as an argument. The result of the comparison is returned as an integer.Typically, it is less efficient than #getCompareToMethod(Object).

      参数:
      o1 - the first object to compare
      o2 - the second object to compare
      返回:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if the first object is less than, equal to, or greater than the second object, respectively
      抛出:
      IllegalAccessException - if the compareTo method is inaccessible
      InvocationTargetException - if the compareTo method throws an exception
      NoSuchMethodException - if the compareTo method is not found
      SecurityException - if access to the compareTo method is denied

    • getCompareToMethod

      default Method getCompareToMethod(Object o1) throws NoSuchMethodException, SecurityException
      Retrieves the compareTo method from the class of the given object.
      参数:
      o1 - the object whose compareTo method is to be retrieved
      返回:
      the compareTo method of the object's class
      抛出:
      NoSuchMethodException - if the compareTo method is not found
      SecurityException - if access to the compareTo method is denied

    • swap

      default void swap(Object[] array, int i, int j)
      Swaps two elements in an array of objects.
      参数:
      array - the array of objects
      i - the index of the first element to swap
      j - the index of the second element to swap

    • swap

      default <T extends Comparable<T>> void swap(T[] array, int i, int j)
      Swaps two elements in an array of comparable objects.
      类型参数:
      T - the type of the array elements which must implement Comparable
      参数:
      array - the array of comparable objects
      i - the index of the first element to swap
      j - the index of the second element to swap

    • sort

      <T extends Comparable<T>> void sort(T[] array, int startIndex, int endIndex, int aix)
      Sorts the given array of objects from the start index to the end index.
      参数:
      array - the array of objects to sort
      startIndex - the starting index of the array
      endIndex - the ending index of the array
      aix - the axis of the array, ASCENDING for ascending order and DESCENDING for descending order
